an9.30:1.3: ‘Anatthaṃ me acari, taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṃ paṭivineti;
an9.30:1.4: ‘anatthaṃ me carati, taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṃ paṭivineti;
an9.30:1.5: ‘anatthaṃ me carissati, taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṃ paṭivineti;
an9.30:1.8: ‘anatthaṃ carissati, taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṃ paṭivineti;
an9.30:1.11: ‘atthaṃ carissati, taṃ kutettha labbhā’ti āghātaṃ paṭivineti.
